text: Robert L. de Kretser (born 1919) was a Sri Lankan cricketer. His most famous feat was catching Don Bradman off B.R. Heyn for 20 in the All-Ceylon vs Australia match in 1948. ==References== * Cricinfo profile: Robert de Kretser Category:1919 births Category:Living people Category:Sri Lankan cricketers Category:All-Ceylon cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: R. L. de Kretser
